Functions
csl_tmrOpen.c File Reference

The file implements the Timer Open API which opens and initializes the Timer handle used subsequently in all Timer API's. More...

#include <ti/csl/csl_tmr.h>
#include <ti/csl/csl_utils.h>

Functions

CSL_TmrHandle CSL_tmrOpen (CSL_TmrObj *pTmrObj, CSL_InstNum tmrNum, CSL_TmrParam *pTmrParam, CSL_Status *pStatus)
 

Detailed Description

The file implements the Timer Open API which opens and initializes the Timer handle used subsequently in all Timer API's.
